meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tony Amato Maureen Rubin Bob Chauls Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #952.

td.p: Tony Amato, an operations manager from North Arlington, New Jersey
Maureen Rubin, a professor from Chatsworth, California
Bob Chauls, a composer & professor from Westlake Village, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $13,500)

tr.td: GERMANY
BOOKS
MAIDEN NAMES
SPORTS
TIME
ANTONYMS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_2', 'clue_J_1_2_stuck', '(Tony: Who was the Kaiser?)
(Alex: Be more specific.)
(Tony: Who was [*]?)
(Alex: Be more specific.)
[Tony laughs and shakes head no.]
(Alex: It\'s [*] II. No, we\'ll take it? Okay.)

Kaiser Wilhelm (II)

Tony
')

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 12):

tr.td: Bob
Maureen
Tony

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Bob
Maureen
Tony
AVIATION FIRSTS
BROADWAY MUSICALS
19TH C. AMERICANS
[The "TH" was uppercase and half the size of the 19.]
PUBLICATIONS
FRENCH FOOD TERMS
AQUATIC LIFE

div.onmouseover:

(Bob: [Too late] [*]!)
(Alex: Yeah, you didn\'t phrase it properly.)
[Alex says something else that cannot be heard clearly.]

Anything Goes

Bob
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_2_3', 'clue_DJ_2_3_stuck', '(AUDIO DAILY DOUBLE) This This Cole Porter show about a shipwreck was rewritten after the Morro Castle disaster: [Patti LuPone sings] The world has gone mad today, / And good\'s bad today, / And black\'s white today, / And day\'s night today, / And most guys today / That women prize today / Are just silly gigolos. / And though I\'m not a great romancer, / I know that I\'m bound to answer / When you propose...')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (AUDIO DAILY DOUBLE) This This Cole Porter show about a shipwreck was rewritten after the Morro Castle disaster: [Patti LuPone sings] The world has gone mad today, / And good's bad today, / And black's white today, / And day's night today, / And most guys today / That women prize today / Are just silly gigolos. / And though I'm not a great romancer, / I know that I'm bound to answer / When you propose...

tr.td: Employees protested when William Shaw was retired as editor of this magazine after 35 years

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_5_5', 'clue_DJ_5_5_stuck', '[End of round signals.]
[Maureen\'s score incorrectly shows $200 instead of -$400. Alex recognized that was wrong and that we would not play in the Final Jeopardy! round.]
(Alex: [After the announcement of the prizes] It isn\'t obvious to the people at home, but we have adopted a new scoring device for our program. We started using it yesterday and it has been giving us a little bit of trouble.)
[Maureen\'s total is correctly displayed as -$400.]

blancmange

Bob
